summary: Comprehensive testing of Oxy'ss Barbershop website completed successfully. All major functionality working including backend APIs, frontend pages, booking system, contact form, gallery filtering, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.issue: Direct URL navigation to /services and /contact redirects to homepage
design_issues.description: When accessing /services or /contact directly via URL, the page redirects to homepage. Navigation works correctly when using navbar links from homepage.
design_issues.workaround: Navigation works properly when using navbar links

passed_tests: Backend API - All 9 endpoints (100% success rate)
Gallery page with image filtering and modal functionality
About page with team information and statistics
Navigation between pages via navbar links
Service cards display and hover effects
Gallery image filtering (All Work, Haircuts, Beard Work, etc.)
Contact information cards and business hours
